member.name: T:Game.CameraController
member.summary: Camera controller that supports following a target on a smooth curve and screen shake. For screen shake to work, the needs to be on a child object of the controller, rather than the controller object itself.

member.name: P:Game.CameraController.CameraOffsetTransform
member.summary: [GET / SET] The to which the actual object is parented. Should be a direct child of this object.
